DOC.brief_summary: This open single self-control study , plan recruit 24 case healthy male volunteers.In study , subject give SP2086 metformin , collect blood sample medcine.The purpose evaluate drug interaction SP2086 Metformin .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer body mass index ( BMI , measure person 's weight relation height ) 19 26 kg/m2 , weight among 50100kg . willing use contraception study 6 month .
